daily.text: Great hopes make everything great possible.
daily.author: Benjamin Franklin

daily.text: Failure is a sign post, directing the right road for life’s journey.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Until you prove what is in you, what is in you shall always be what is in you.
daily.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

daily.text: I am proud to have been born in Iowa. Through the eyes of a ten-year-old boy, it was a place of adventure and daily discoveries - the wonder of the growing crops, the excitements of the harvest, the journeys to the woods for nuts and hunting, the joys of snowy winters, the comfort of the family fireside, of good food and tender care.
daily.author: Herbert Hoover

daily.text: I have to have a daily, vibrant relationship with Jesus in order to survive that process toward healing.
daily.author: Beth Moore

daily.text: Teaching does allow me to keep one foot in the youthful waters I tend to occupy in my novels, so I'm thankful for that. My students also remind me on a daily basis that the stories I collected during my district attorney days are actually interesting to people who haven't had that experience.
daily.author: Alafair Burke

daily.text: The grace and mercy by which you are not arrested for not paying your daily oxygen bills, is the grace that is sufficient to take you through successfully. It's the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ. Enjoy it!
daily.author: Israelmore Ayivor

daily.text: It used to upset me - now it makes me sad - to see people use patriotism and our troops as a pawn in their political argument. Because I know personally, growing up in a military family, the sacrifice that is made on a daily basis.
daily.author: Tamron Hall

daily.text: Pray in your family daily, that yours may be in the number of the families who call upon God.
daily.author: Christopher Love

daily.text: Life gives us a flair of awareness in the breeze of our daily journey and offers a free reign to explore what we are, to experience what we are not and to find out what we may become: a free ride until everything melts down into the indistinct and indefinite, while walking up to the ultimate gate of non-existence. ('Living on probation').
daily.author: Erik Pevernagie

daily.text: In every day life, I try to communicate to sacred strangers in the bus, street, trains, neighbourhood, offices, shops, library, schools, university, colleagues…!
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Exercise, prayer, and meditation are examples of calming rituals. They have been shown to induce a happier mood and provide a positive pathway through life's daily frustrations.
daily.author: Chuck Norris

daily.text: I had parents who believed I could do anything - and I know how that made me feel. I think both my parents, having careers in the medical profession, feel they are helping people on a daily basis, and that was inculcated in me as a value. I had to struggle with giving up the idea of becoming a doctor myself.
daily.author: Reese Witherspoon

daily.text: When I worked at the W. M. Keck Observatory on the 13,796 feet very high altitude summit of Mauna Kea, we would routinely be engulfed in cold clouds of helium and nitrogen gas as we discharged it into the video camera systems daily. The management team never warned us that we were in a hazardous oxygen deprived environment during this activity that was known for its ability to adversely affect physical and mental health, and possibly bring on death by asphyxiation.
daily.author: Steven Magee

daily.text: Many losses have gone sinking daily by our inability to recognize the great deal of power reserved in us. Watch out and make it real because soon, it's going to be your turn to shine!
daily.author: Israelmore Ayivor

daily.text: My hope fuels my determination to overcome any difficulty.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: By fundamentally changing how we design the places and systems that enable our daily lives, we can slash emissions way beyond the immediate carbon savings - because our own personal emissions are just the tip of a vast iceberg of energy and resources consumed far from our view.
daily.author: Alex Steffen

daily.text: When you dare to dream, dare to follow that dream; dare to suffer through the pain, sacrifice, self-doubts and friction from the world.
daily.author: Laura Schlessinger

daily.text: It's through a leader's actions - what he or she does and says on a daily basis - that the essence of great leadership becomes apparent.
daily.author: Travis Bradberry

daily.text: I found that dance, music, and literature is how I made sense of the world... It pushed me to think of things bigger than life's daily routines... To think beyond what is immediate or convenient.
daily.author: Mikhail Baryshnikov

daily.text: The Civil Rights Act of 1964 laid the foundation for the Voting Rights Act of 1965, but it also addressed nearly every other aspect of daily life in a would-be free democratic society.
daily.author: Aberjhani

daily.text: The good news is that you are alive. The essential thing is that you must live.
daily.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

daily.text: In the morning, I use a Philosophy cleanser and Olay Regenerist Daily 3 Point Treatment Cream, which sinks in well and feels firming. I rarely wear foundation, so cotton wool soaked in warm water is often enough to cleanse at night, but I take off eye make-up with Klorane's cornflower-infused remover.
daily.author: Saffron Aldridge

daily.text: Computers will be able to do all the mundane tasks in our daily lives.
daily.author: Aaron Swartz

daily.text: Every day is a dance deed.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: May God grant us grace for our daily work.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: I notice that young men go to the universities in order to become doctors or philosophers or anything, so long as it is a title, and that many go in for those professions who are utterly unfit for them, while others who would be very competent are prevented by business or their daily cares, which keep them away from letters.
daily.author: Galileo Galilei

daily.text: Master Teachers who genuinely embody an enlightened state of being never stop “doing the work”. The ego is what assumes it knows enough, causing cessation of these daily practices, and therefore, Masters without attachment to ego are forever students of the Universe. The Masters attain an illuminated state of “Being” as the outcome, yet it is the consistent “doing” that promotes and maintains their enlightenment.
daily.author: Alaric Hutchinson

daily.text: The failure of the nation lies in the failure of its citizens.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

wanderlust.text: It might be well enough to wander if you've a place and people to come back to, but I tell you now there's no desolation like wanting to go home and truly not knowing where it is.
wanderlust.author: Elizabeth Kerner

wanderlust.text: Travel is costly yes, but it pays dividends too.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: You can’t make a small world for yourself, because what are you going to do when that small world implodes?
wanderlust.author: S.R. Crawford

wanderlust.text: I don't know where I am going, I just know I had to leave. Everything I was I carry with me, everything I will be lies waiting on the road ahead.
wanderlust.author: Ma Jian

wanderlust.text: One soft humid early spring morning driving a winding road across Mount Tamalpais, the 2,500-foot mountain just north of the Golden Gate Bridge, a bend reveals a sudden vision of San Francisco in shades of blue, a city in a dream, and I was filled with a tremendous yearning to live in that place of blue hills and blue buildings, though I do live there, I had just left there after breakfast.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: And we laugh and laugh andall I know isat this moment I feel likeI can do anything I wantand be anyone I wantand go anywhere on the globeand still call it home.
wanderlust.author: Kirsten Smith

wanderlust.text: I am an artist, my hair is rarely tamed & sometimes I sleep till noon, My house is messy and I speak to the moon. I care less about the materials that I share with my world and more about the passion inside myself. I'm an artist, what more can you expect? I am full of soul, love and all the rest.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: It was the inverse of an island in the sea.
wanderlust.author: Elisabeth Eaves

wanderlust.text: Without knowing why or how, I found myself in love with this strange Wanderess. Maybe I was just in love with the dream she was selling me: a life of destiny and fate; as my own life up until we met had been so void of enchantment. Those things: mystery, fate, enchantment... They are things that young people offer us as soon as we get close to them. And if we're not careful, we can be seduced by, and drawn back into, the youthful world they preside over.
wanderlust.author: Roman Payne

wanderlust.text: From centuries ago before the dawn of civilization, I have been wandering. I am the wanderer. I can't stay at one place. I am destined to wander from place to place!And I keep wandering in search of a nothingness. The river embraces me and guides me to swim inside her and to drink the nectar of love from her bosom. She tells me her secrets and I tell her mine. She makes me sensitive and soft.The mountain greets me with respect and guides me to traverse the rocks and crevices of its body! He is strong and vigorous and he appreciates my stamina and toughness.After dusk in the night, the stars smile at me and they show me light to travel in the darkness. They tell me their stories and I tell them mine.The moon embalms me with her love and she kisses me good night. The nightingale sings her song of love when I take rest in the arms of darkness in the night!And after the dawn of the morning, the sun greets me and acknowledges my spirit and strength!I am the wanderer and I keep wandering in search of a nothingness.I am the wanderer and wandering is my destiny!
wanderlust.author: Avijeet Das

wanderlust.text: I will never lose the love for the arriving, but I'm born to leave.
wanderlust.author: Charlotte Eriksson

wanderlust.text: For I was reared in the great city, pent with cloisters dim,and saw naught lovely but the sky and stars.But thou, my babe! Shalt wander like a breezeBy lakes and sandy shores, beneath the cragsOf ancient mountains, and beneath the clouds,Which image in their bulk both lakes and shoresAnd mountain crags: so shall thou see and hearThe lovely shapes and sounds intelligible Of that eternal language, which thy GodUtters, who from eternity doth teachHimself in all, and al things in himselfGreat universal teacher! He shall moldThy spirit and by giving , make it ask.
wanderlust.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

wanderlust.text: She smiled, and said, “Take care that the voice of God and the Devil sound one in the same in the desert. Trust your instincts. You were not put on this earth to be naïve, blindly optimistic, or passive; you are here to be vigilant, to survive.
wanderlust.author: M.B. Dallocchio

wanderlust.text: Didn't know where I was going. Didn't care where I ended up. I knew I'd be okay though.
wanderlust.author: Darnell Lamont Walker

wanderlust.text: From this point forward, you don’t even know how to quit in life.”~ Aaron Lauritsen, ‘100 Days Drive.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: Nostalgia in reverse, the longing for yet another strange land, grew especially strong in spring.
wanderlust.author: Vladimir Nabokov

wanderlust.text: Will I ever see the mountains or am I doomed to roam the flatlands?
wanderlust.author: Jessica-Lynn Barbour

wanderlust.text: I'm sorry! I really am! I wanted to get out of this place! I want to live! I want to get away from here and never see it again! I hate everything about it!'You will hate the next place, too,' I said. 'What you are you will carry with you.
wanderlust.author: Louis L'Amour

wanderlust.text: You have to keep doing it, Even if no one is watching. The best artists, are those Who live from their expressions, Not chasing the impressions.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: It is hardly unusual for a young man to be drawn to a pursuit considered reckless by his elders; engaging in risky behavior is a rite of passage in our culture no less than in most others. Danger has always held a certain allure. That, in large part, is why so many teenagers drive too fast and drink too much and take too many drugs, why it has always been so easy for nations to recruit young men to go to war. It can be argued that youthful derring-do is in fact evolutionarily adaptive, a behavior encoded in our genes. McCandless, in his fashion, merely took risk-taking to its logical extreme.
wanderlust.author: Jon Krakauer

wanderlust.text: And you must not worry about me. You must follow your dreams. You have your life ahead of you. I am just a wanderer passing by.
wanderlust.author: Avijeet Das

wanderlust.text: Am I making something worth while?I’m not sure.I write and I sing and I hear words from time to time about my life and choices making ways, into other lives, other hearts,but am I making something worth while?I’m not sure.There was a boy last night who I never spoke to because I was too drunk and still shy, but mostly lonely, and I couldn’t find anything lightly to say,so I simply walked awaybut still wondered what he did with his lifebecause he didn’t even speak to meor look at mebut still made me wonder who he wasand I walked away askingAm I making something worth while?I am not sure.I am a complicated person with a simple lifeand I am the reason for everything that ever happened to me.
wanderlust.author: Charlotte Eriksson

wanderlust.text: Portland was a dream both in the literal sense and the metaphorical sense, both tangible and not - a fleeting affair you want to hold on to but can't, so you try memorizing her every detail only to fail to do so in the consumption, in the savoring, in the absorbing of yourself into her. When she's gone, she comes to you in snippets, replaying in your mind like a fragmented picture show.
wanderlust.author: Jackie Haze

wanderlust.text: She's an old soul with young eyes, a vintage heart, and a beautiful mind.
wanderlust.author: Nicole Lyons

wanderlust.text: The beauty he saw in her was the beauty she forgot to see in herself and what a beautiful reminder, that love is what will see us all through.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: Building bridges is the best defence against ignorance.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: Travel can sometimes push us to lose ourselves and find ourselves at once. The shedding of old prejudices, dead skin, and the opening of one’s eyes is far better than what any mainstream news outlet could ever tell you.
wanderlust.author: M.B. Dallocchio

wanderlust.text: ..Luxury is the enemy of observation, a costly indulgence that induces such a good feeling that you notice nothing. Luxury spoils and infantilizes you and prevents you from knowing the world. That is its purpose, the reason why luxury cruises and great hotels are full of fatheads who, when they express an opinion, seem as though they are from another planet. It was also my experience that one of the worst aspects of travelling with wealthy people, apart from the fact that the rich never listen, is that they constantly groused about the high cost of living – indeed, the rich usually complained of being poor.
wanderlust.author: Paul Theroux

wanderlust.text: Explore, Experience, Then Push Beyond.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: It’s hard to go. It’s scary and lonely…and half the time you’ll be wondering why the hell you’re in Cincinnati or Austin or North Dakota or Mongolia or wherever your melodious little finger-plucking heinie takes you. There will be boondoggles and discombobulated days, freaked-out nights and metaphorical flat tires.But it will be soul-smashingly beautiful… It will open up your life.
wanderlust.author: Cheryl Strayed

motivational.text: Christmas, so joyfully celebrated within our hearts and within the hearts of countless others.
motivational.author: Eleesha

motivational.text: Then holding the star aloft and the bright sword advanced, Frodo, hobbit of the Shire, walked steadily down to meet the eyes.
motivational.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

motivational.text: Your money is just a condition to get my business, your professionalism is the price.
motivational.author: Amit Kalantri

motivational.text: As long as I have a want  I have a reason for living. Satisfaction is death.
motivational.author: George Bernard Shaw

motivational.text: You never know what people have endured to get where they are.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: The beauty of today may not be realised until it becomes tomorrow’s memory.
motivational.author: Steven Aitchison

motivational.text: With every step we take we have a choice to make. Our choices determine our actions. Our actions determine who we are.
motivational.author: Randall Marr

motivational.text: Take all of your wasted honorEvery little past frustrationTake all of your so-called problems,Better put 'em in quotations.
motivational.author: John Mayer

motivational.text: Data has no ego and makes an excellent co-pilot.
motivational.author: Jay Samit

motivational.text: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: Success sits on a mountain of mistakes.
motivational.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

motivational.text: Emotions manipulates the man more than habits do.
motivational.author: Amit Kalantri

motivational.text: …It's as if they actually think that what other people think of them somehow doesn't matter. I mean, I know we're all supposed to believe that, but obviously, none of us actually do. And nor should we, because it does! It does matter! And the people who genuinely believe it doesn't tend to be the very people who ought to care most what other people think of them, because what the other people are thinking is, 'No, actually, I don't think the Chinese are 'up to something,'' or, 'You should use mouthwash,' or, 'Your mania for the collective socialization of agriculture will surely cause the deaths of millions,' or, 'Forty cats is too many cats.
motivational.author: David Mitchell

motivational.text: To become a better you, remember to be grateful to people who have contributed to making you who you are today.
motivational.author: Israelmore Ayivor

motivational.text: The gift of the moments and its lessons prepares us for a better tomorrow.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: ‎By reacting from fear instead of responding from love, you inject poison directly into the veins of your relationship.
motivational.author: Steve Maraboli

motivational.text: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
motivational.author: Auliq-Ice

motivational.text: When a lion kills a deer it does not build negative KARMA, its meant that way!!!!
motivational.author: Harrish Sairaman

motivational.text: You will need to know when to be assertive and wise enough to know when to exercise patience.
motivational.author: Julian Pencilliah

motivational.text: When you need motivation, look no where! Just say 'YES, I CAN DO IT.
motivational.author: Mohith Agadi

motivational.text: Holding on, holding out and holding fast when the going is tough constitutes a winning mindset.
motivational.author: Ogwo David Emenike

motivational.text: Do you want to grow spiritually? Build better relationships? Succeed in your career? Conquer anxiety and find peace? Break a bad habit? Be healed from the emotional wounds of your past? Then meditate on, ponder, think about, practise mentally, and verbalise the Word of God. Instead of living off someone else’s spiritual insight, study God’s Word for yourself and allow the Holy Spirit to bless you with life-transforming insights. Jesus said, ‘The Spirit takes my message and tells it to you’ (John 16:15). And you’ll experience the truth of those words when you personalise the Scripture you’re reading.
motivational.author: Patience Johnson

motivational.text: A surrendered heart leads to greatness. A stubborn heart leads to struggle.
motivational.author: Todd Stocker

motivational.text: Saying 'thank you' signifies sense of gratitude, but it also implies your incapability.
motivational.author: Amit Kalantri

love.text: Love is the moonlight when the moon is your heart.
love.author: Debasish Mridha

love.text: The Santa Ana Windgusts downdesert canyons.Hot. Dry. Electric.Some say it ignites tempers.I say it ignited us.
love.author: Kristin Elizabeth Clark

love.text: On the seventh day of the Seventh-month, in the Palace of Long Life,We told each other secretly in the quiet midnight worldThat we wished to fly in heaven, two birds with the wings of one,And to grow together on the earth, two branches of one tree.'Earth endures, heaven endures; some time both shall end,While this unending sorrow goes on and on for ever.
love.author: Bai Juyi

love.text: And among many understandings and misunderstandings, Lany and Antony once again were victims of an illusory love...
love.author: Pet Torres

love.text: And as you lay in my arms oh woman you looked more beautiful than the moon!
love.author: Avijeet Das

love.text: We have to consciously study how to be tender with each other until it becomes a habit because what was native has been stolen from us, the love of Black women for each other.
love.author: Audre Lorde

love.text: Learn to let urgency go. Nothing is urgent. Stress is the product of uncertainty and urgency of life.
love.author: Debasish Mridha

love.text: A great giftwe can giveto ourselvesis a willingnessto love everyone,no matter what.This frees us completely from the toxicjustificationswe use to hate.
love.author: Scott Stabile

love.text: The truth is a community is as big or as small as your heart lets it be.
love.author: Genevieve Dewey

love.text: I laughed as we turned in a tight circle... 'Tonight you're all mine.'Jake smiled but looked me dead in the eye. 'No. From now on.'My heart skipped. 'What?'Yours,' he said simply, 'from now on.
love.author: Kieran Scott

love.text: We swam deep in the waves, a wild chase ..Stained with memories and pain.Who knew a gulf would lay between?Who knew loving someone, would ache?
love.author: honeste_

love.text: And then there will be the times when I see you laughing. Like the time you’ll be playing with the neighbor’s puppy, poking your hands through the chain-link fence separating our back yards, and you’ll be laughing so hard you’ll start hiccupping. The puppy will run inside the neighbor’s house, and your laughter will gradually subside, letting you catch your breath. Then the puppy will come back to the fence to lick your fingers again, and you’ll shriek and start laughing again. It will be the most wonderful sound I could ever imagine, a sound that makes me feel like a fountain, or a wellspring.
love.author: Ted Chiang

love.text: Love encompasses so much, reaches so far, and heals so deeply, that any attempt to describe it, no matter how poetic, only dilutes it.
love.author: Steve Maraboli

love.text: They did not use the sonic stunners but the foray gun, the ancient weapon that fires a set of metal fragments in a burst. They shot to kill him. He was dying when I got to him, sprawled and twisted away from his skis that stuck up out of the snow, his chest half shot away. I took his head in my arms and spoke to him, but he never answered me; only in a way he answered my love for him, crying out through the silent wreck and tumult of his mind as consciousness lapsed, in the unspoken tongue, once, clearly, 'Arek!' Then no more. I held him, crouching there in the snow, while he died. They let me do that. Then they made me get up, and took me off one way and him another, I going to prison and he into the dark.
love.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

love.text: Courage is a warrior, wisdom is a sage, virtue is a priest, and love is poet.
love.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

love.text: It’s only when we are able to exceed our rigid interpretations, and we start defining love in it’s totality, that we realize that love is everywhere.
love.author: Julian Pencilliah

love.text: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham).
love.author: Ally Condie

love.text: A loving heart is always young.
love.author: Debasish Mridha

love.text: She was learning something important: how to live within the sound of her own slow breathing, how to love the view when her eyes were shut.
love.author: Gwendoline Riley

love.text: I turn my head so that he doesn't see my smile and secretly curse him for making me feel special.
love.author: Kasie West

love.text: You battled monsters. You sweat and cried your way to this one prolific moment where you finally realize that those dark days and sleepless nights were pre-requisites to your becoming.
love.author: Jennifer Elisabeth

love.text: Something happened to you, they discovered, when you were given the unconditional love and trust of a child.You wanted to try to deserve it.
love.author: Lisa Kleypas

love.text: Every soul is beautiful and precious; is worthy of dignity and respect, and deserving of peace, joy and love.
love.author: Bryant McGill

love.text: It is well to believe that there needs but a little more thought, a little more courage, more love, more devotion to life, a little more eagerness, one day to fling open wide the portals of joy and of truth.
love.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

love.text: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
love.author: Debasish Mridha

love.text: I tried to hold fire once...See from a distance it mesmerized me captivated me for hours at a timeThe more it danced with the wind, I felt my body sway to its rhythm I tried to hold fire onceIt's glow drew me in closerAnd although I know full well the damage that fire can do...Staring directly at it, I know it's beauty tooIt's warmth was now on my face and I couldn't imagine being in any other placeI reached out with my bare hands & it danced even moreAnd suddenly I felt it's heat deep within my coreRising like a volcano ready to eruptBut somehow balanced & purposefulI tried to hold fire once until I realized that fire held me Passionately and I was it's guiding force. If you look close enough, you'll see it dancing in my eyes, feel it in my touch, even hear it in my voice...But don't ever forget that fire consumes and cannot be contained so I must master my energetic output to control the flames.
love.author: Sanjo Jendayi

love.text: While the new Legionnaire man eliminated his enemies in the name of God, with a cross in his hand, the new Communist man eliminated God altogether and stood on His pedestal. They were both equally thirsty for blood.
love.author: Teodor Flonta

love.text: Would he ever have the strength to stop looking?
love.author: J.K. Rowling

love.text: I have never seen as far, than those times I have looked through someone else's perspective.
love.author: Tonny K. Brown

love.text: Love is the theme of all religions but making it commercial is satanic”.
love.author: Amit Abraham

happiness.text: Do you believe in other universes? Do you think there's another dimension where we're happy?
happiness.author: Jasmine Warga

happiness.text: We have to be honest to ourselves to see honesty in others.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: People who have wellbeing and feel fulfilled, need far less than people who feel unfulfilled, who always seem to need more.' By Rethinking Your Mindset you can create SWIFT sustainable success.
happiness.author: Tony Dovale

happiness.text: Love is the moonlight when the moon is your heart.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: It is painful those feelings of pain,but accept it with love to see the gain.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Offence is an event, offended is a decision. Offence and offended we have to live through it but to stay offended? To live in that place denies the very nature of the salvation that you claimed to have received.
happiness.author: Patience Johnson

happiness.text: Happiness is the interval between periods of unhappiness.
happiness.author: Don Marquis

happiness.text: One of the greatest gifts in this world is the ability to make others smile. - The Unauthorized Autobiography of Jonathan Fisher.
happiness.author: J.E.B. Spredemann

happiness.text: Anger and resentment are the cancer of our mind. To be cured, inject love in your heart and be kind.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
happiness.author: Euripides

happiness.text: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: While filling color to someone's life to whom you really love & care, make sure to fill little color of joy & happiness which should not hurt the beauty of their life. Don't prove that you are an artist just express your art, that's the love and life is...
happiness.author: Navnath Godse

happiness.text: Inner peace is a sacred blessing.
happiness.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

happiness.text: Faith is the leverage we need to liberate us from the shackles of unbelief.
happiness.author: Auliq-Ice

happiness.text: Let me eat the love and digest it.Let me love the flower and beautify it.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Where else,' I will say, 'does an old turtle crossing the path Make all the difference in the world?
happiness.author: Patricia MacLachlan

happiness.text: We cannot really love anybody with whom we never laugh.
happiness.author: Agnes Repplier

happiness.text: I love you as the moon loves the nightto show her charm, beauty and magic of light.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: First Cosmic Seal:(Devic Seal 333) One who has received this Cosmic Seal is empowered to control not less than 40,000 spirits.
happiness.author: Compton Gage

happiness.text: And then there will be the times when I see you laughing. Like the time you’ll be playing with the neighbor’s puppy, poking your hands through the chain-link fence separating our back yards, and you’ll be laughing so hard you’ll start hiccupping. The puppy will run inside the neighbor’s house, and your laughter will gradually subside, letting you catch your breath. Then the puppy will come back to the fence to lick your fingers again, and you’ll shriek and start laughing again. It will be the most wonderful sound I could ever imagine, a sound that makes me feel like a fountain, or a wellspring.
happiness.author: Ted Chiang

happiness.text: To promote peace, promote understanding. To promote understanding, promote love.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: When you become addict in to MATERIAL things in life then the TRUE natural life start to run away from you, YES! It's can give you certain pleasure in the society but in the same time it will sabotage your true HAPPINESS of life which we could have simply with GRATITUDE and FORGIVENESS.
happiness.author: Rashedur Ryan Rahman

happiness.text: Do the thing you fear  and the death of fear is certain.
happiness.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

happiness.text: Let him that would be happy for a day  go to the barber  for a week  marry a wife  for a month  buy him a new horse  for a year  build him a new house  for all his lifetime  be an honest man.
happiness.author: Anonymous

happiness.text: The one thing most important to anything else is to be happy.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: There is no fortitude like patience, just as there is no destructive emotion worse than hatred.
happiness.author: Auliq-Ice

happiness.text: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
happiness.author: Auliq-Ice

happiness.text: Das Einzige, wonach wir mit Leidenschaft trachten, ist das Anknüpfen menschlicher Beziehungen, nichts ist uns umgekehrt so schmerzlich als das Auflösen derselben. Unser Glück und Unglück hängt von unseren menschlichen Beziehungen ab.
happiness.author: Ricarda Huch

happiness.text: We are all actors in life. Some act like they won’t amount to much while others do the opposite. You have a choice.
happiness.author: Mensah Oteh

happiness.text: Manifest kindness to embrace greatness.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

positive.text: You have the power to realise your dream. If only you are willing and determined.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: I will sacrifice today for tomorrow.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: The death of dogma is the birth of reality.
positive.author: Immanuel Kant

positive.text: The science of psychology has been far more successful on the negative than on the positive side... It has revealed to us much about man's shortcomings, his illnesses, his sins, but little about his potentialities, his virtues, his achievable aspirations, or his psychological health.
positive.author: Abraham Maslow

positive.text: Daring life, graceful living.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Subject to the law(s) of nature, hate is born to die.
positive.author: T.F. Hodge

positive.text: The most beautiful period of time in our life are the ones which we understand that the problems are our own. And we should not blame other cause of our own problems, we need to realize that we are the one who control our own future, let's remember that maybe we will not have always a peaceful life and may not always be able to solve all of our problems that we face at once but we don't have to stop trying to find a solution way for it, we need to be positive and have courage and working hard to get what what we want cause I don't believe in excuses that most of us made but I believe in courage , being positive and hard working. Let's be positive and have courage.
positive.author: Arash Tabish

positive.text: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: My hope fuels my determination to overcome any difficulty.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: May we continue to encourage one another, so that we will increase in strength and in wisdom.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: We only need grace to endure every situation.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: ...I don't ever want to feel that way. Feel as if there are no surprises left. The surprises make life worth living. Expecting nothing, accepting it all. Accepting isn't the right word. ACKNOWLEDGING it all. I suppose I'll just try to figure it out as I go or at least try to understand it. Or f***, just think about it. I'll face whatever comes my way...
positive.author: John O'Callaghan

positive.text: A foolish consistency is the hobgoblin of little minds  adored by little statesmen and philosophers and divines.
positive.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

positive.text: Not every problem can be solved. Some are okay simply to avoid. Go around the, go under them, whatever it takes to reach your higher goal. Sometimes you have to fail your way to success.
positive.author: Anna Mitchael

positive.text: When God gives you an idea, you must act immediately on it.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: It is only an error in judgement to make a mistake  but it shows infirmity of character to adhere to it when discovered.
positive.author: Christian Bovee

positive.text: Dwell on positive thoughts!
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: A stiff attitude is one of the phenomena of rigor mortis.
positive.author: Henry S. Haskins

positive.text: Opportunities may surface clearly, but it takes a positive mind to see them. Positive people think and think possibilities even in difficulties and failing situations.
positive.author: Israelmore Ayivor

positive.text: I think 'Heroes of Cosplay' will show a lot of the positive things, like how much effort it takes to make a costume. These people on the show aren't taking shortcuts. As long as that effort gets through to the viewers, we will be inspirational. Then there will be people who watch the show that want to get in and hands-on make outfits.
positive.author: Yaya Han

positive.text: The gift of fantasy has meant more to me than my talent for absorbing positive knowledge.
positive.author: Albert Einstein

positive.text: You are capable beyond measure.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: The greater part of our happiness or misery depends on our dispositions  and not our circumstances.
positive.author: Martha Washington

positive.text: When you believe it, you've created it, whatever it is.
positive.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

positive.text: Don’t be a victim of circumstances. Choose victory by gracious endurance.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Learn from the sun; it is warm to everyone, and is therefore never in short supply of those who adore it.
positive.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

positive.text: It is better to hope than despair.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Whatever you did today is enough. Whatever you felt today is valid. Whatever you thought today isn't to be judged. Repeat the above each day.
positive.author: Brittany Burgunder

positive.text: God has great riches for you. If thy will seek Him.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham).
strength.author: Ally Condie

strength.text: Sic vis pacem para bellum - if you want peace, prepare for war.
strength.author: A.J. Darkholme

strength.text: She was alone and destitute in a world of pointless carnage. By an eight-hundred-year-old Sepahrdic tradition she ad been since the age of twelve and a half 'bogeret l'reshut nafsha'--an adult wit authority over her own soul. The Torah taught, Choose life. And so, rather than die of pride, Sofia Mendes sold what she had to sell, and she survived.
strength.author: Mary Doria Russell

strength.text: Man's delight in the Lord is the absolute peak of human triumph. He praises God when full of joy, and when not, he praises God to become full of joy. For to know and to live as though God is worthy of all praise, in all one's circumstances, whether seemingly good or seemingly bad, is the primary definition of joy and the richest triumph for man under God.
strength.author: Criss Jami

strength.text: Politics doesn’t mean playing deceitful and trickery games against the people, it means playing resourceful and organized games for the people.
strength.author: Amit Kalantri

strength.text: Strength is not defined by the load you bear, it’s defined by the amount you can bend before breaking.
strength.author: Blake Mays

strength.text: People with vision sees opportunity where there is problem. They see money not problem.
strength.author: Patience Johnson

strength.text: Trust your instincts, follow your bliss, make plans, work hard, learn to let things go. Don’t be late. Remember that fortune favors the brave. Live. If you need to run, try and run toward something. Study for tests. Laugh at silly cartoons. Be organized. If you fall seven times, get up eight. Always carry an extra pen. Believe you can do everything. Find your key.
strength.author: Nina Lane

strength.text: In knowledge there is strength, in understanding there is might, and in wisdom there is power.
strength.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

strength.text: Endure despite the pain. The key is grace of strength.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: My expectations were reduced to zero when I was 21. Everything since then has been a bonus.', December 12, 2004)].
strength.author: Stephen Hawking

strength.text: If you lose faith, then you begin to fear.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: We think we are so strong but it is only when others try to prey on our weaknesses that we realize how frail we truly are.”-Skyla (from Twiceborn).
strength.author: JP Robinson

strength.text: Whenever you encounter any fearful situation, there exists a great possibility for you to triumph only if you be willing enough to conquer the fear.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: All through my life, I have been tested. My will has been tested, my courage has been tested, my strength has been tested. Now my patience and endurance are being tested.
strength.author: Muhammad Ali

strength.text: Fighting physically signifies spiritual weakness.
strength.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

strength.text: If you let tragedy change you, You have already lost.
strength.author: Nikki Rowe

strength.text: You may encounter many disappointments. Be strong. Tell yourself, “I am good enough, I will try again.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Keep your fears to yourself, but share your courage with others.
strength.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

strength.text: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: But we are strong, each in our purpose, and we are all more strong together.
strength.author: Bram Stoker

strength.text: Stand strong. Stand firm. Stand tall like tower.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: God seemed to be having a hard time killing him, and he'd be damned if he was going to make the job easy for mere mortals.
strength.author: Mario Puzo

strength.text: My spouse is my shield, my spouse is my strength.
strength.author: Amit Kalantri

strength.text: Courage is the power to let go of the familiar.
strength.author: Raymond Lindquist

strength.text: Promise YourselfTo be so strong that nothingcan disturb your peace of mind.To talk health, happiness, and prosperityto every person you meet.To make all your friends feelthat there is something in themTo look at the sunny side of everythingand make your optimism come true.To think only the best, to work only for the best,and to expect only the best.To be just as enthusiastic about the success of othersas you are about your own.To forget the mistakes of the pastand press on to the greater achievements of the future.To wear a cheerful countenance at all timesand give every living creature you meet a smile.To give so much time to the improvement of yourselfthat you have no time to criticize others.To be too large for worry, too noble for anger, too strong for fear,and too happy to permit the presence of trouble.To think well of yourself and to proclaim this fact to the world,not in loud words but great deeds.To live in faith that the whole world is on your sideso long as you are true to the best that is in you.
strength.author: Christian D. Larson

strength.text: By faith we will become strong and withstand the spiritual battle warring against us.
strength.author: Sunday Adelaja

strength.text: Luck is for those with nothing else. I wish you strength and courage.
strength.author: Annette Marie
